title: We Slaves of Nature
content:
We slaves of nature cast before we’re born
Limited life and no real time to mourn
Whether monsters or those with dignity
Some find kindness, some levity
Most are given colors ecstatic earth’s mountains sky desert and the sea
We flounder some and then we cease to be.
I found love and laughter reasons to exist
Causing people’s pain to desist
I’m glad you’re here and I am happy
Too
This precious second in this great
Milieu
